title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

  • One point is earned for identifying the consumer surplus as P3JM.

  • One point is earned for identifying the producer surplus as P1P3M.
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • One point is earned for identifying the consumer surplus as P3JM.

  • One point is earned for identifying the producer surplus as P1P3M.

The student earns one of the following points:

  • One point is earned for identifying the consumer surplus as P3JM.

  • One point is earned for identifying the producer surplus as P1P3M.

The student earns all of the following points:

  • One point is earned for identifying the consumer surplus as P3JM.

  • One point is earned for identifying the producer surplus as P1P3M.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: One point is earned for identifying the socially optimal quantity as q1.
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

One point is earned for identifying the socially optimal quantity as q1.

The student earns all of the following points:

One point is earned for identifying the socially optimal quantity as q1.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

  • One point is earned for identifying the consumer surplus as P5JK.

  • One point is earned for indicating that there is no deadweight loss.
descriptions:
